Translations.Text: They are not the same, some of the people of the book rise and read Godâ€™s signs during the night and show their humbleness
they believe in God and the last day, and they instruct to the right (acceptable) and prohibit from the wrong (unacceptable) and they rush to do good, and they are of the righteous
And whatever good they do, it will never be rejected, and God knows those who control themselves
Indeed those who disbelieved, their wealth and their children will never be of any use to them against God, and they are inhabitants of the fire remaining in there forever

The example of what they spend (in God's way) in this world's life is like an ice cold wind that hits harvest of a group who wronged themselves and destroys it. God did not wrong them, but they wrong themselves

You who believe, do not take any confidant besides yourselves, as they will not stop to drive you crazy, and they wish you what agonizes you, hatred has appeared from (words of) their mouths , and what their chests hides is even greater. We have clarified Our signs for you, if you understand

You love them while they do not love you, and you believe in all the books (while they do not). When they meet you they say: we believed. And when they are alone, they bite their fingertips because of the anger for you. Say: die with your anger. God knows what is inside the chests

If any good happens to you it upsets them and when any bad happens to you, they enjoy it. And if you persevere and control yourselves, their plots does not cause the least bit of harm to you. God surrounds what they do
And (remember) when you left your family early in the morning to assign the positions of the believers for the war (battle of Ohod). God hears all and knows all
(Remember) when two groups among you intended to be cowardly while God was their protector (and supporter), and believers should put their trust in God
And God helped you at (war of) Badr while you were weak, so be cautious of God, that you may be thankful
(Remember) when you told the believers: is it not enough for you that your Master helps you with three thousands angels being sent down
Yes, if you persevere and control yourselves, and they suddenly come upon you (and attack you), your Master helps you with five thousands striking angels
And God only made it as good news for you and to reassure your hearts with it. And the help is only from the powerful and the wise God
In order to cut off (and wipe out) a part of those who disbelieved, or to subdue them so they turn back disappointed
Nothing is up to you, He either accepts their repentance or punishes them. They are indeed wrongdoers
Everything in the skies and on the earth belongs to God, He forgives whom He wants and punishes whom He wants. And God is forgiving and merciful
You who believe, do not consume usury multiplying (compounding) it over and over, and be cautious of God, so you may be successful
And be cautious of the fire that is prepared for the disbelievers
And obey God and the messenger so you may receive mercy
